question: Who has won the 2017 World Snooker Championship?
explanation: Mark Anthony Selby, an English professional snooker player from Leicester, has won the 2017 World Snooker Championship by  beating John Higgins 18â€“15 in the final  at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. With this win, Selby has become the fourth player after Steve Davis, Stephen Hendry and Ronnie O\'Sullivan to claim back-to-back titles in the modern era. Selby is the reigning World and UK snooker champion and is the current world number one snooker player.
